Module camp_management_and_application_system
Package services

Class CampStudentService

java.lang.Object
services.CampStudentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICampStudentService
public class CampStudentService extends Object implements ICampStudentService
CampStudentService implements ICampStudentService interface and provide camp functions in the role permission of a student

    • registerForCamp

      public boolean registerForCamp(String studentID, int campID, boolean committee)
      Description copied from interface: ICampStudentService
      Registers a student for a specific camp.
      Specified by:
      registerForCamp in interface ICampStudentService
      Parameters:
      studentID - The ID of the student to be registered.
      campID - The ID of the camp for registration.
      committee - A boolean indicating whether the student wants to become a committee.
      Returns:
